doc.field: Notre Dame du Liban, Janto in Harissa, Lebanon. Armenian text on reverse: My dear Perchuhi. I am sending you this picture of famous Notre-Dame du Liban. How are you? How is everything? We are all awaiting letters from you. Kisses to everyone. Signed Rosa Askian. 14.0 x 8.9 cm

Notre Dame du Liban, Janto in Harissa, Lebanon. Armenian text on reverse: My dear Perchuhi. I am sending you this picture of famous Notre-Dame du Liban. How are you? How is everything? We are all awaiting letters from you. Kisses to everyone. Signed Rosa Askian. 14.0 x 8.9 cm
Black and white photographic print of Notre Dame du Liban, Janto in Harissa, Lebanon. Armenian writing on the reverse. 14.0 x 8.9 cm: 7 August 1937
